about_the_game:
Join Emerald Caravan, fulfill the dream of becoming a caravan master and restore family business!

This world is filled with magic as much as it is with mysteries – many use the power of crystals to fuel their machines, however none seems to know how exactly they work. During your adventures, you’ll explore treacherous dungeons and find yourself in the middle of the unbelievable events hidden deep in the chambers. Craft items with the loot you’ve found and manage your mobile store in order to expand your business. Keep your eyes open and uncover more secrets as you travel the land. Who’s responsible for your family's caravan fall and how can you bring them to justice?

Travel

As you travel the land far and wide, you’ll eventually meet new friendly townsfolk. Win their affection by fulfilling their quests and who knows – some of them might even join you in your adventures! Cultivate your new friendships as your companions share a great knowledge of the world around you that might come in handy.

Fight

You’re not here only to make friends. It’s high time to visit the dungeons! Once you’re there, enhance your fighting abilities with various skills and randomized spells. Defeat the enemies and gather resources to sell and craft unique items with the help of your travel companions. That will keep clients interested in visiting your shop and all that money flowing.

Trade

Take your business with you everywhere you go, thanks to a mobile shop inside your caravan cart. Display items, set prices and serve your customers. Adjust to your clientele’s needs and tastes as they will vary across different regions. Keep the customers satisfied and they will surely come for more!

Mystery

In this world everything is not as it seems. Your family business collapse wasn’t just an accident and to prove it you’ll need to gather credible evidence and find the culprit. Some of the dungeons are filled with strange technology and an invisible string somehow ties it to caravan’s early demise. Nothing is lost, as you can still restore your family's good name – how you’l do it is up to you.

Magicpunk

In Emerald Caravan sorcery and technology slowly meld into one. Artificers experiment with fueling machines with enchanted crystals that can be found deep in the mountains, however none had discovered how exactly their power works yet. Maybe you’ll be the one to make a breakthrough in magic studies?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or higher
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT / Radeon HD 6570
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560

short_description: Set in a vibrant and mystical world, Emerald Caravan will invite you to embark on a journey filled with magic, mystery, and discovery. Travel, explore dungeons, sell goods in your caravan shop and discover the secrets of your family's business!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
